author: quintonm
msg: Authorized and Persistent tools now require an an additional check of user.hasLoggedIn() before
they are added.  Although, this should be redundant to checking isAnonymousUser() this has been
reverted until we can come to an agreement on the dev list.

author: quintonm
msg: Bug fix:  Session tools should be added to the user even if the user is the anonymous one.

author: quintonm
msg: Added information about the changes to Turbine.loginUser(), Turbine.logoutUser(), and

author: quintonm
msg: Eemoved the outdated documentation about the Turbine servlet using the <resources> init parameter
to determine the implementation of TurbineResources to be used.
The loginUser method no longer removed all data from the session.  The logoutUser method will
invalidate the session before the logout action is called.
